argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f w x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-rlim | |- ~~>r = { <. f , x >. | ( ( f e. ( CC ^pm RR ) /\ x e. CC ) /\ A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR A. w e. dom f ( z <_ w -> ( abs ` ( ( f ` w ) - x ) ) < y ) ) } |
| 2 |  | #P_opabssxp | |- { <. f , x >. | ( ( f e. ( CC ^pm RR ) /\ x e. CC ) /\ A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR A. w e. dom f ( z <_ w -> ( abs ` ( ( f ` w ) - x ) ) < y ) ) } C_ ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_eqsstri | |- ~~>r C_ ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dmss | |- ( ~~>r C_ ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) -> dom ~~>r C_ dom ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom ~~>r C_ dom ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) |
| 6 |  | #P_dmxpss | |- dom ( ( CC ^pm RR ) X. CC ) C_ ( CC ^pm RR ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sstri | |- dom ~~>r C_ ( CC ^pm RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_rlimrel | |- Rel ~~>r |
| 9 | 8 | #P_releldmi | |- ( F ~~>r A -> F e. dom ~~>r ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_sseldi | |- ( F ~~>r A -> F e. ( CC ^pm RR ) ) |
